dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: It was lunchtime and I was eating alone (the usual for me), but as I got halfway through my food my phone started to ring a whole bunch.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Urgh...how annoying...It looks like two of my 'friends' want me to hang out with them...I really don't want to though...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I started to contemplate leaving the school early...But as I did I noticed my hand started to burn where the curse mark was...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Okay, okay I get it, fine...I will hang out with one of them today...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I open up my phone and begin reading the text messages. The first is from Chuuni-Chan...The second is Lucci-Chan...

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Hey Takeshi-Kun. I need your help today with the investigation!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Okay so that was Chuuni's, now how about Lucci's text?

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: Hello my destined one...how about coming to spend time with me today after school?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I think both will be rather annoying to spend time with...Maybe I should cancel on both of them?
